name: Valiant Arena
description:
Enter the arena where you fight as a mage, priest or warrior. Play 1vs1 or 2vs2 with and against AI or with other players. Party up with a friend to strategise as you face stronger opponents and climb in rank. 

This game is put in early access far before it is fully polished to see if there are players interested so don't expect a very polished experience. There may be bugs which will be fixed as development goes on.  There may not be many players to play against online at the moment so use practice mode or get your friends to try it with you.
